  • Lucario Theme

    30 Jun • 2014

    I always had problems when it came to theme, so I created my own theme! This theme was inspired by the flat design, i’ve picked some popular colors in this concept.

    The name of this theme is Lucario and is available for Vim, Atom, Sublime Text, Terminal.app and iTerm.

    Get Lucario!

    Do you like or have any suggestion? I would love to receive your feedback about the Lucario Theme.
